reviewText: I am not sure how far it is useful for my kid who wants to learn Bharatanatyam
not what i thought. more for someone who already has this dancing experiance. still nice for what it is, but not for someone who is beginning to learn from step one.
Very useful practicing, reviewing material for Bharatanatyam adavus. Shows the adavus in slow motion and with the hand movements, eye movements, etc. Easy to follow.
